author: Gillian Flynn
review: A gripping thriller that keeps you guessing until the very end, with unexpected twists and turns.

author: Paula Hawkins
review: An enthralling psychological thriller with complex characters and a compelling narrative.

author: Erin Morgenstern
review: A mesmerizing tale of magic, love, and illusion, beautifully written and utterly enchanting.

author: Celeste Ng
review: A thought-provoking exploration of motherhood, identity, and privilege, told through richly developed characters.

author: Delia Owens
review: A hauntingly beautiful novel that transports you to the marshes of North Carolina, blending mystery, romance, and nature seamlessly.

author: Liane Moriarty
review: A riveting story of secrets, friendship, and betrayal, with a perfect balance of suspense and humor.

author: Tara Westover
review: An inspiring memoir of resilience and self-discovery, detailing the author's journey from a survivalist family to Cambridge University.

author: Madeline Miller
review: A spellbinding retelling of Greek mythology from the perspective of the enchantress Circe, weaving a tale of magic, power, and identity.

author: Donna Tartt
review: A sprawling and immersive novel that explores art, loss, and redemption through the captivating story of a young boy and a stolen painting.
